{"title": "Henry Halfhead", "title_search": "henry halfhead", "title_keyword": "henry halfhead", "url": "https://www.metacritic.com/game/henry-halfhead/", "summary": "Have you ever wanted to be a bed? An apple? Or even a paper plane? Wait no longer; here comes Henryyy!

Henry Halfhead is a quirky sandbox adventure game about an odd little character with the peculiar ability to possess and control any object within their reach. Discover every object's unique properties and abilities and cleverly combine them to progress through Henry's not-so-ordinary everyday life.

Become a knife to slice your morning toast, water your beloved plants as a watering can, and experience how much fun making your bed as bouncy wobbly pillows can be. Unlock new rooms and objects as you progress and grow your surroundings into a joyful playground. Explore each level and try alternative solutions to challenges to discover additional objects and story bits.

Play through a wholesome story, fully voiced by a humorous narrator. Confronted with rules and obligations, Henry loses their playfulness and curiosity for the world while growing up. Overworked and unhappy with their life, Henry decides that it's time for change. {"title": "Dream Park Story", "title_search": "dream park story", "title_keyword": "dream park story", "url": "https://www.metacritic.com/game/dream-park-story/", "summary": "Throw open the gates to a magical kingdom of fun and thrills!

Create and customize your own amusement park. From humble attractions like the teacup ride or trampolines, you'll be able to build up to bigger and better things. You can even hire mascots and hold fantastic parades!

What do your visitors like best? How can you improve? There's no better place to check up-to-the-minute feedback than the park's social media. Work hard, and you might attract the attention of famous online influencers!

Your adventure on Easy Street

Your goal is to make your way down Easy Street, finding and purchasing each of the five items on your shopping list. But watch out for Knuckles, the pesky gorilla! She'll try to sneak aboard your wagon, and you won't be able to get into stores where animals aren't allowed! Then you'll have to take her all the way back home before you can continue your journey.

Reading, math, problem-solving

Easy Street introduces youngsters to classification, discrimination and visual memory skills, as well as counting and matching. The game is designed to give children the ability to roam freely within the game environment, thus experiencing an astonishing sense of control.

Challenge Upgrade, our You-Control Feature

Like all Mindplay games, Easy Street is designed with Challenge Upgrade, which allows players to modify game options and educational content to suit individual needs. {"title": "2weistein - The Curse of the Red Dragon", "title_search": "2weistein  the curse of the red dragon", "title_keyword": "2weistein  the curse of the red dragon", "url": "https://www.metacritic.com/game/2weistein-the-curse-of-the-red-dragon/", "summary": "Action Adventure and practicing math basics: „2weistein“ combines lots of fun with a modern way of training maths. Often one also has to solve puzzles.

The Story
All was peace and quiet in Asban and the whole land of Trillion – until that day on which the gates remained closed, as if by ghostly hand, and other strange things happened. The mean magician Godron has stolen the book „Mathematica“ from the creator of Trillion, and has cast an evil spell over the city: a ban on mathematics. Godron wants to gain power over the whole land and transform the world according to his will. But there are the brave heroes Bernard and Celestine with their friend 2weistein who want to put a stop to Godron to keep Trillion peaceful and beautiful, and no on is ever to be afraid again!

About the 2weistein games
The unique and fantastic idea behind the series of 2weistein games is to train maths in a real 3D action adventure. Embedded in the tantalizing story the player has to solve maths quests or puzzles to get ahead in the game. It was developed by game specialists in cooperation with teachers and psychologists and won several prices and awards in Germany and Austria.", "genre": ["Edutainment"], "metascore": 0, "critic_reviews": 0, "user_score": 0, "user_reviews": 0, "release_date": "2020-09-14", "images": ["https://www.metacritic.com/a/img/catalog/provider/6/12/6-1-767643-52.jpg", "https://www.metacritic.com/a/img/catalog/provider/6/12/6-1-767643-52.jpg"], "video": null, "video_type": null, "sentiment": null, "must_play": false, "crew": null, "countries": [], "companies": ["Red Octopus (Developer)", "Red Octopus Entertainment (Publisher)"], "platforms": ["Nintendo Switch"], "rating": "E10+", "official_site": null}

Kurokami-sama's Feast is an adventure visual novel with mystery and danger around every corner. Players will explore the streets of Japan in search of clues to find the monsters that live among us.

{"title": "Hatsune Miku: COLORFUL STAGE!", "title_search": "hatsune miku colorful stage", "title_keyword": "hatsune miku colorful stage", "url": "https://www.metacritic.com/game/hatsune-miku-colorful-stage/", "summary": "Join Hatsune Miku in her latest mobile rhythm game and discover a rich cast of characters overcoming their struggles through the power of music.

The best Music Game experience at your fingertips with the latest Hatsune Miku adventure!

{"title": "BlackJack (Color version)", "title_search": "blackjack color version", "title_keyword": "blackjack color version", "url": "https://www.metacritic.com/game/blackjack-color-version/", "summary": "In this BlackJack game, you will be playing against the computer. The boxes that show the cards show up to seven cards, each card taking up two spaces vertically in the box, one for its rank, one for its suit.

The object is to get as close as possible to 21 without going over. The face cards are worth 10 and the Ace is worth 1 or 11, your choice. 

If someone gets exactly 21 'BlackJack!' is called and a new game begins. A new game also automatically begins if someone goes over 21. You can bet with the money you have, too.

The whole game is over if you run out of money or hit ESC.", "genre": ["Gambling"], "metascore": 0, "critic_reviews": 0, "user_score": 0, "user_reviews": 0, "release_date": null, "images": ["https://www.metacritic.com/a/img/catalog/provider/6/12/6-1-798299-17.jpg", "https://www.metacritic.com/a/img/catalog/provider/6/12/6-1-798299-17.jpg"], "video": null, "video_type": null, "sentiment": null, "must_play": null, "crew": null, "countries": [], "companies": ["HeliX Software (Publisher)", "HeliX Software (Developer)"], "platforms": ["PC"], "rating": null, "official_site": null}

Play classic Picross, as well as Mega Picross featuring Mega Numbers, Color Picross featuring colored hint numbers, Clip Picross where you complete stories, and bonus Extra content featuring large puzzles.
Supports touch screen as well as button controls. Up to four players can play simultaneously.
There are detailed tutorials and convenient assist functions so that even newcomers can start playing right away.
Try out a variety of optional features to customize your play environment to your liking.
This release includes the new "Rewind Board" feature. It's a handy feature for when you notice inconsistencies while you're solving a puzzle.

There are 300 Picross and Mega Picross puzzles, 150 Clip Picross piece puzzles, 30 Color Picross puzzles, and 5 Extra puzzles, a grand total of 485 puzzles!

{"title": "LUCY'S HEAVEN", "title_search": "lucys heaven", "title_keyword": "lucys heaven", "url": "https://www.metacritic.com/game/lucys-heaven/", "summary": "'Iru', who recently lost her long-time family member 'Lucy' (dog), was covered in tears under the blanket at a lonely night. Suddenly, Molina and Pal, members of the Dreamcatchers appeared in Iru's room.

To help Iru overcome grief, Molina offered Iru to meet Lucy again in the dream, so that she can say a proper goodbye this time. Even though it was just in a dream, but knowing that she can meet Lucy again, Iru picked herself up to draw a magic door that leads to the dream world with the magic crayon that Pal handed over to her.

Lucy's Heaven is a VR game created to improve mental health for those whose dogs recently crossed the rainbow bridge. You will enter the dream world following Iru's story and relax yourself at the cozy forest camping site while watching the camp fire with the dog.

Drone turrets, which are created inexhaustibly because they do not carry people, fly over every country, shooting at each other, breaking down, and crashing. Day and night, explosions continue to be heard from the skies above, and debris rains down on the ground.

{"title": "Megafortress Collection", "title_search": "megafortress collection", "title_keyword": "megafortress collection", "url": "https://www.metacritic.com/game/megafortress-collection/", "summary": "Take to the skies for gripping air-assault missions with the Megafortress Collection. {"title": "Sentimental Death Loop", "title_search": "sentimental death loop", "title_keyword": "sentimental death loop", "url": "https://www.metacritic.com/game/sentimental-death-loop/", "summary": "How many times will you die by your best friend's hand? Break free of this cycle, or be doomed to die forever!


Just as you begin to settle in for a fun day at your best friend's house, something changes in her and she kills you. And not just once—she ends your life time and time and time again.

Your goal is to escape from this endless loop of despair.


■Jump through time to change your destiny!

The investigation portions of the game are rendered in three-quarter view.
Work toward your escape by searching rooms for the items and clues needed to solve puzzles and disarm traps. Time travel to obtain new, useful information capable of changing your destiny.
Your goal is to use the methods available to you and escape the never-ending loop of death.

■Your dear friend stalks toward you with a knife.Use the items at your disposal to escape!

Nemu may try to corner you while you're investigating a room.

Strategy and action are key in this game.

Round People is a video game in which the player controls a billiard ball and must fight against other balls on a table full of deadly traps.

Each ball has powers that can be used in the fight, such as shooting lightning or summoning a shield. The game allows up to four players to play simultaneously.
Players must dodge obstacles and traps as they fight for victory in this exciting pool game with a twist of fantasy and action.

You will have to think fast and act even faster to emerge victorious. Use your cunning and strategy to defeat your friends in games full of action and fun.

{"title": "Yurutto Gaku Hero Sekai no Kaiga", "title_search": "yurutto gaku hero sekai no kaiga", "title_keyword": "yurutto gaku hero sekai no kaiga", "url": "https://www.metacritic.com/game/yurutto-gaku-hero-sekai-no-kaiga/", "summary": "Many famous paintings that everyone has seen once. But surprisingly, you don't know the artist, the title, or the intention behind the creation
!?

{"title": "The Crackpet Show: Happy Tree Friends Edition", "title_search": "the crackpet show happy tree friends edition", "title_keyword": "the crackpet show happy tree friends edition", "url": "https://www.metacritic.com/game/the-crackpet-show-happy-tree-friends-edition/", "summary": "Happy Tree Friends are back! Remember those rebellious days when parents forbade us from watching this cute cartoon, and we had to sneak around? Well, guess what? Now you can embrace the legendary cruelty and humor of the iconic cartoon as you play your favorite characters in The Crackpet Show: Happy Tree Friends Edition! Get ready to unleash chaos, earn fame, and have a blast!

Are you ready to get famous? If so, grab your gun and join the most violent TV show in the history of violent TV shows! Participants will have to shoot, smash and rip through hundreds of enemies on their way to victory!

Don’t be discouraged by THE GIANT BOSSES that are more than capable of turning your innards outwards – just grab the best perks and weapons along the way. Make your gun spew molten lava all over the floor, turn yourself into a berserker, and let your bullets bounce between enemies! All these things stack, so you have every opportunity to turn your furry warrior into a raging death machine.

You’ll still die, though. That’s just how life is, even for those who wield a rail gun. But who cares about death when your audience loves YOU? Unlike real life, here you can make good use of the likes you receive.

Use your new-found fame to help upgrade every item and every perk to deal even more damage when you head out again. Oh, don’t worry about getting bored: every episode of the show is randomized so you’ll never have the same run twice in-a-row.
And, when you are completely done with show business, invite your friends and party-up with co-op mode with up to four players! Play smart and synergize with the team or bash their teeth in when they will try to steal your power-ups: every dirty trick in the book is valid, and every strategy works as long as you are having fun.

{"title": "Firefighter Simulator 911 : Car Fire Truck Driver", "title_search": "firefighter simulator 911  car fire truck driver", "title_keyword": "firefighter simulator 911  car fire truck driver", "url": "https://www.metacritic.com/game/firefighter-simulator-911-car-fire-truck-driver/", "summary": "Strap on your helmet and duty belt, and get ready for the mission! Explore over 30 areas inspired by real locations across the United States!
In the game Firefighter: Firefighter Simulator 911 : Car Fire Truck Driver, you'll step into the shoes of a real fire brigade worker in a large American city. Experience thrilling tasks in more than 30 different locations, all inspired by the scenic landscapes of the US West Coast. Drive carefully recreated Rosenbauer America vehicles, extinguish fires using heavy firefighter equipment and tools!
You'll have access to authentic firefighting equipment, including helmets, safety shoes, firefighter axes, crowbars, water guns, and breathing apparatus from renowned American manufacturers.
Fire alarm! Time is of the essence! Put on your shoes, zip up your firefighter uniform, secure your duty belt, don your helmet, start the fire truck, activate special signals and sirens, and take the shortest route to save lives.
Whether it's an industrial area, the suburbs, or the city centre, firefighters are needed everywhere to rescue people! Do you have what it takes to become a highly skilled firefighter? Take on the challenge right now and become the city's number one lifesaver!
Game Features:
• Realistic fire simulation: The game accurately recreates the behaviour of water, smoke, heat, counter drafts, and various causes of fires, including those caused by electronics, chemicals, and explosions.
• The meticulously designed physics system reliably depicts the spread of flames and its impact.

{"title": "Space Maze", "title_search": "space maze", "title_keyword": "space maze", "url": "https://www.metacritic.com/game/space-maze/", "summary": "In a distant future, humanity had managed to colonize different planets and expand throughout the galaxy. The galactic spaceship "Aurora" was on a crucial mission for the survival of the human race: to transport a cure for a deadly disease that was ravaging one of the most important colonies.

However, the ship encountered an unexpected obstacle: a labyrinth with deadly traps designed to prevent any ship from getting too close. The labyrinth was located in a remote sector of space, and its existence was unknown until now. 

The captain of the ship, the fearless John Smith, needs you to take control of the situation and lead the crew to freedom.
